1.name: Lemma Access (Words/Formulas)
1.description: Single words and memorized chunks - no grammatical processing

2.name: Category Procedure (Lexical Morphology)
2.description: Word-level grammatical marking - gender, number on single words
spanish_examples: mi hermano / tu hermana / su libro

3.name: Phrasal Procedure (Phrase-level Agreement)
spanish_examples: el coche rojo / la casa roja
los coches rojos / las casas rojas

4.name: Sentence Procedure (S-V Agreement)
4.description: Sentence-level processing - subject-verb agreement, word order

5.name: S-Procedure (Subordinate Clause)
5.description: Inter-phrasal processing - pronouns, reflexives, basic subordination
structures: Direct object pronouns (lo, la, los, las)

color_coding.description: Visual color differentiation for grammatical features

pre_pattern.template: üëÄ Look at these examples. What do you notice about {feature}?

input_flooding.description: Multiple examples of same pattern to ensure noticing
input_flooding.display_format: Grouped together with pattern visually highlighted

typographic_salience.example_format: habl|o, habl|as, habl|a, habl|amos, habl|√°is, habl|an

explicit_comparison.example: SER vs ESTAR: permanent vs temporary

shadowing_config.rationale: Basic vocabulary must be established before shadowing practice

rhythm.description: Compare timing pattern using DTW algorithm
